name: Mr. Mime
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It shapes an invisible wall in midair by minutely vibrating its fingertips to stop molecules in the air.

poke_body.name: Focus Wall
poke_body.effect: If Mr. Mime would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack that does 70 or more damage (after applying Weakness and Resistance), Mr. Mime is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attacks.name: Desperate Slap
attacks.effect: If Mr. Mime already has 5 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.
